name: Steno
description: We provide secure, private, custom conversational AI solutions that transform content into engaging, personalized user experiences. Our platform can be deployed within a company's infrastructure or as a fully managed SaaS solution, enabling businesses to scale efficiently and increase revenue while retaining full control over their data.
one_liner: We provide secure, private, custom conversational AI solutions that transform content into engaging, personalized user experiences. Our platform can be deployed within a company's infrastructure or as a fully managed SaaS solution, enabling businesses to scale efficiently and increase revenue while retaining full control over their data.
